data.title: Ty Dolla Sign (Tee Dolla Sign): Artist Biography
data.meta_description: Ty Dolla Sign (Tee Dolla Sign): Artist Biography - Salve Music - Bio - Biographies of musicians - Personal life - Interesting facts - Encyclopedia of music
data.text:
Ty Dolla Sign is a modern example of a versatile cultural figure who has managed to achieve recognition. His creative "path" is heterogeneous, but his personality deserves attention.

The American hip-hop movement, having appeared in the 1970s of the last century, has strengthened over time, cultivating new members.

Some followers only share the views of famous participants, others actively seek fame.

Childhood and youth Tyrone William Griffin

Tyrone William Griffin Jr., better known as Ty Dolla Sign (Ty Dolla $ign or Ty$), was born on April 13, 1985 in South Los Angeles, California.

Tyrone William is the son of established musician Tyrone Griffin, who rose to prominence in the funk band Lakeside. This circumstance predetermined his love for music, further development in this area.

The boy received his first experience in the musical field while learning to play musical instruments. Tyrone (younger) mastered bass guitar, drums, MPC. From childhood, the boy did not differ in diligent behavior.

He early joined the criminal group, was associated with drugs. Tyrone was part of the Bloods alliance gang, and his brother was listed in the warring Crips clan.

The beginning of Ty Dolla Sign's career

Tyrone Griffin (Jr.) has been interested in hip-hop culture since childhood. In 2006, he took the pseudonym Tee Dolla Sayn. Together with his mastermind, Corey made a deal with the famous studio Buddah Brown Entertainment. The first song Raw & Bangin Mixtape Vol. 2.

Partners in secondary roles participated in the recording of releases by famous Black Milk, Sa-Ra Creative Partners. The collaboration between Ty Dolla Sign and Corey did not last long. Tyrone quickly found a new ally, which became YG. The musical friendship reached the point of participating in a group under the label YG Pu$hazInk.

Start of solo work

In 2011, Ty Dolla Sign announced his debut solo track. The composition All Star was not very popular, but stimulated creative development.

At the same time, the performer worked with other rappers. The track from this period, My Cabana, was included in the list of the best songs compiled by Complex magazine in 2012.

In the same year, 27-year-old Ty Dolla Sign signed a contract with Atlantic Records. Active work has begun. Already in the fall, the Beach House mixtape was released, and in the winter - the next "portion" of compositions.

Too $hort, Wiz Khalifa and other hip-hop artists worked with the artist. After the release of the second part of Beach House, Tyrone signed a record deal with Wiz Khalifa Taylor Gang Records.

Reaching New Heights Ty Dolla Sign

By the middle of 2013, Ty Dolla Sign with Khalifa and A$AP Rocky were scheduled to tour Under the Influence of Music 2. Soon after the concerts ended, Tyrone announced a solo song Paranoid. The artist shot a video clip for this composition.

The new brainchild provided the singer with popularity. The track peaked at number 29 on the Billboard Hot 100 hits. Later it was certified platinum by the RIAA.

In January 2014, the singer recorded the next track, which was destined to become popular. The artist also shot a video clip for the song Or Nah. The creation was attended by Canadian The Weeknd, as well as singer Wiz Khalifa. The single repeated the popularity of the artist's first hit, similarly receiving the status of "platinum" level.

Simultaneously with the recording of the second hit, Ty $ released his debut album. It became a collection of songs featuring numerous hip hop artists. The Beach House EP was developed by Tyrone himself and DJ Mustard. In 2014, the performer attracted the attention of XXL magazine. The artist was awarded the title of leader among the hip-hop discoveries of the year.

Ty Dolla Sign Studio Compilations

In 2014, in addition to participating in projects, Ty $ started preparing for the recording of the debut album Free TC. It only came out in November 2015. Individual tracks hit the net, their popularity increased.

At the peak of T.D.'s rise, Sign never stopped working with other artists. Participated in their tracks, invited to record their compositions. In October 2017, the singer recorded his second studio album Beach House 3.

Producer and authoring activities T Dolla Sign

In 2016, Ty Dolla Sign with Future participated in a project with a political bias. The musicians released a video clip for the song Campaign. The subtext was political. The words of the track called on citizens to take an active civic stand - to vote in the upcoming elections.

Ti Dolla Sayn not only wrote lyrics for himself and performed them. He and his associates Chordz 3D, G Casso created the DRUGS team, which was engaged in the promotion of artists. Ty$ wrote lyrics for other artists. Famous names singing his creations include Chris Brown, Rihanna.

Tee Dolla Sign's appearance and personal life

Ti Dolla Sign has a typical appearance for a representative of the Negroid race. The man is tall: 188 cm, average weight is about 86 kg. In appearance, the artist adheres to the views of representatives of hip-hop culture - dreadlocks, many tattoos, clothes and accessories.

There is no stability in the singer's personal life. Like any famous man, Tyrone Griffin (younger) has short intrigues. In 2017-2019 the artist was seen in a stable relationship with Loren Jauregui. The couple had a daughter, who was named Jailynn Crystall.

Experts in the music world are sure that the peak of Ty Dolla Sign's popularity has not been passed. The artist is in the prime of his life, he “burns” with creativity, he will definitely present to the world something worthy of approval.
